product_name: GoLite HydroCruise Hydration Lumbar Pack - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Built for long day hikes, the HydroCruise Hydration Lumbar Pack is the largest lumbar carrier made by GoLite. It handily holds your liquids, edibles, a lightweight shell and other essentials. Angled, lightly-insulated bottle holsters with bottom drain holes hold 1-liter or 1.5-liter water bottles (not included). 2 zippered compartments fit lunch and more. Soft stretch-mesh hipbelt moves moisture quickly. Zippered stretch hipbelt pockets. Easy-to-adjust load control system reduces bounce. GoLite HydroCruise Hydration Lumbar Pack has 360deg reflectivity. Closeout.
short_description: Built for long day hikes, the HydroCruise Hydration Lumbar Pack is the largest lumbar carrier made by GoLite. It handily holds your liquids, edibles, a lightweight shell and other essentials.
